Articles.Content:
I summon the power of Anubis to keep me alive and turn the box into ashes.

I summon an undead army to the next poster.
I retreat to space, and I land on top of the next poster.

Nice, you landed on my explosive-rigged robot that resembles me. You are blown up into space.

The next user is as well.

That makes no sense, considering that I was just blown into space.

The next poster took the top hat guy's advice. (the xkcd top had guy is the stick man with a top hat in my forum signature.)

[]

Edited August 2, 2019 by CvVtjRtb

I survive and become immune.

The next poster thinks that the self destruct button dispenses snacks.

It does. Someone rigged it to make it dispense snacks.

The next poster thinks that the red button doesn't do anything.

The button actually does nothing.

The next poster finds himself next to a nuke that will explode in 10 seconds:

Except only the timer is functional.

The next poster is next to a bomb that will explode in 1 nanosecond, with tons of functional explosives ready to be set alight.

Except I happen to be in this here warp capable space ship traveling faster then the speed of light at the time.

I crash into the next poster.

Honey! Did something crash into my forcefield?

I send the PLA to the next poster.

I don't know what PLA is and this is what came up when I Googled it:

I am just going to say that I hid from it, whatever it is.

The next poster presses the big red button.

Edited November 11, 2014 by mikeman7918

It dispenses money!

The next poster is stuck in mud on rubber boots. No edge to the mud in sight.

I flag down a nearby helicopter to help me.

The helicopter is piloted by Jedediah Kerman, and he fails at stunt flying, crashing into the next poster.

Well, it's still on the mud planet, so it's a soft landing.

The next poster can't escape from the helicopter as it fills with mud.

Scotty beams my up.

I fire the phasers at the next poster.

I don't know what PLA is and this is what came up when I Googled it:

http://i.imgur.com/FtQld2j.png

I am just going to say that I hid from it, whatever it is.

Sorry, I ment People's Liberation Army.

I added some parts that someone deleted so Gilly comes back into the game and absorbs the phaser fire.

Gilly rolls towards the next poster.

Edited November 11, 2014 by CelticCossack51

I use my jet pack to successfully get away.

The next poster's space station (that they are in) is hit by space debris.

Currently not a threat. Maintenance maybe needed, however.

The next poster is hit by a huge space debris.

I warp through it.

The next poster is so excited for the next ep. of ERB Season 4 that..... well..... I can't say. Let's just say it would get extreme.

I don't even know what that is, so how could I be exited about it.

The next poster finds himself in the middle of the zombie apocolipse.
I outrun the zombies. I came back using the next poster as a human shield
I use my armour power reactor to cause you to be electrocuted, then drop a city from orbit onto the next poster
I drop the next user on the city that you are dropping on me.

I slow the city down with a bit of gravity manipulation, bringing it to a hover above the terrain. I grab the next poster and push them off, flinging them out of the gravity bubble and down towards the surface below.
